name: 11:59PM at the Convenience Store
description:
Made for the "Stop Waiting for Godot Jam"

A game that emulates the extremely specific feeling of buying snacks from a Convenience Store late at night.

Experience the thrill of slowly meandering around a cold, damp and dark store in the early hours of the morning.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • E  - Pickup / Put down items and interact with doors
  • Mouse - Rotate item in hand
  • Left Click - Purchase item currently being held
  • Escape - Quit
